description.en: Why did the stalker choose Hyunsung? It began with gifts. First, candies, milk cartons, confectionaries piling outside his small apartment’s door. Then, the meals. Dinner cooked and waiting for him, perfectly timed for when he arrived late from his mundane office job. Soon he began to accept it, the feeling of being watched, like it even. But why him? Who is the stalker? Can Hyunsung really let this continue…trust him? Or is it all just a game…

altTitles.th: มังกรน้อยแสนซน อลวนจอมเวทย์

altTitles.ja: コーセルテルの竜術士物語

description.en: Corseltel is a fantasy land where dragons and humans live together in harmony. Dragon Sorcerers, in return for borrowing power from the dragons to use magical spells, must take care of the dragon offspring. Mashel, said to be one of the best Dragon Sorcerers in all Corseltel, is able to use all 7 dragon types meaning that he must take care of 7 different dragon children. The dragon children, each representing the types (dark, light, fire, water, wind, earth, life) learn to harness their power through Mashel and also look up to him as a parent. The cuteness of the dragon kids and the life lessons they learn will capture many readers.

title.en: Weile Fuhuo Anlian De Shi Zun Wo Bei Po Kaile Hougong

altTitles.zh: 为了复活暗恋的师尊我被迫开了后宫

altTitles.zh-ro: Wèile Fùhuó Ànliàn De Shī Zūn Wǒ Bèi Pò Kāile Hòugōng

altTitles.en: I Was Forced to Open a Harem to Resurrect the Master I Had a Crush on

description.zh: 花樱樱一朝穿成小孤女，命悬一线之时，天降仙女师尊，救她于水火。 于是花樱樱日日撩夜夜追，终于舔化冰山，只等师尊渡劫成功就能双宿双修，双宿双飞…… 谁成想师尊居然渡劫失败，碎成了渣渣！ 为了复活师尊，花樱樱穿梭七重镜界，要和七个不同身份的切片师尊酱酱酿酿，水乳交融！ 花樱樱捏拳，无奈道：开后宫什么的，都是为了拯救师尊呐！

altTitles.ja: 疑似ハーレム

description.en: The story of Nanakura Rin of the Drama Club, who has indisputable talent as an actress, and her senpai in the same club, Kitahama Eiji. With the power of her acting, Rin teases Eiji with a variety of personas, giving him the harem he's always dreamed of!
description.fr: Voici l'histoire de Nanakura Rin du club de drama, ayant un talent indiscutable en tant qu'actrice, et de son senpai Kitahama Eiji. Grâce à ses talents d'actrice, Rin taquine Eiji avec multiples personnalités, lui donnant le harem dont il a toujours rêvé.
description.it: Questa è la storia di Nanakura Rin del club di teatro, che ha un talento indiscutibile come attrice, e del suo senpai Kitahama Eiji. Grazie al suo talento di attrice, Rin prende in giro Eiji con molteplici personalità, dandogli l'harem che ha sempre sognato.
description.pl:
Historia dwojga członków Klubu Teatralnego – Rin Nanakury i jej Senpaia – Kitahamy Eijiego.  
Rin, przy użyciu swoich aktorskich umiejętności, odgrywa różnorodne postacie, tworząc tym samym Senpaiowi jego wymarzony harem!
description.pt: Rin Nanakura, uma talentosa atriz do clube de teatro, e o seu veterano no mesmo clube, Eiji Kitahama. Com suas habilidade de atuação, Rin brinca com Eiji fazendo várias personagens, e montando o harém (de uma pessoa só) que ele sempre sonhou!
description.uk: Історія про Нанакуру Рін, яка має талант до акторства, та Кітахаму Ейджі - її семпая, який мріє про власний гарем.
description.pt-br: A história de Nanakura Rin do Clube de Drama, que tem talento indiscutível como atriz, e seu senpai do mesmo clube, Kitahama Eiji. Com o poder de sua atuação, Rin provoca Eiji com uma variedade de personagens, dando-lhe o harém com que ele sempre sonhou!

description.en:
Flora moves into a mysterious mansion and finds it inhabited by a strange creature—Creepy Cat!
Thus begins her strange and sometimes dangerous life with a feline roommate.
This Gothic comedy brings the chuckles…and the chills!

Source: Seven Seas Entertainment
description.uk: Флора тільки-но переїхала до старого будинку, але тут вже живе моторошний котик. Відтоді й почалось їхнє таємниче співіснування.
description.ur: فلورا ابھی ایک پرانے گھر میں منتقل ہوئی ہے، لیکن وہاں پہلے ہی ایک ترسناک بلی رہ رہی ہے۔ تب سے ان کی پراسرار ہم آہنگی کا آغاز ہوا۔

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z sąsiedztwa niezwykle mnie rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

description.en: 100 Short Manga about Types of and Behavior in Yuri Relationships
Indeed it is, indeed it does. A street action comic featuring the life of Jang Gwangnam leading up to the creation of the Killberos Tribe.

altTitles.ru: Непринужденная жизнь в другом мире экс-кандидата в герои, оказавшегося читером со 2 уровня

altTitles.zh: 勇者候补的悠闲的异世界生活

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Thảnh Thơi Tại Dị Giới Gian Lận Của Cựu Ứng Viên Dũng Giả Từ Cấp Độ Hai

description.en: Banaza, who was summoned to the magic kingdom of Cryroad as a Hero candidate, was disqualified as a Hero because of his ordinary abilities. He was supposed to be returned to his original world, but due to the magical kingdom's mistake, he became unable to return to his original world. However, the moment he reached Level 2, he acquired every single possible skill and kind of magic, turning him into a super cheat with infinite skills! Despite this, he takes Fenris of the demons as his wife, and fully enjoys his newly-married life with an easygoing smile. He changes his name to Fulio and tries to lead his life quietly, but things are a bit chaotic with the likes of a pet saber, four freeloading female knights, a Majin, and even an ex-Demon Lord. However, even with all of this chaos, he still manages to enjoy his life peacefully.
description.fr: Un jour, Banaza a été invoqué dans un autre monde, le Royaume magique de Cryroad en tant que candidat Héroïque. Malheureusement, Banaza fût disqualifié des candidats Héroïque car ces statistiques étaient très basique. Alors, le Royaume décida de l'emmener loin du château car il était inutile. Mais alors qu'il se retrouva tout seul, un ennemi apparu devant lui, avec quelques difficultés, il réussit à vaincre l'ennemi, c'est alors qu'il monta de niveau, mais pas tout à fait normalement…
description.ja: 栄えある勇者候補として異世界に召喚された青年バナザは、能力値の低さから勇者失格の烙印を押され国外追放処分となる。なんとか生き延びるべくモンスターを倒すと、レベルが２に上がり彼のステータスが見慣れない「∞」の記号に変わっていた……。突然のステータス変化に戸惑いながらもマイペースに生きていくことを決意するが、魔族の娘フェンリースと運命的な出会いを果たし――!?
description.ru:
Баназа был призван в волшебное королевство Крайроуд в качестве кандидата в герои, но на нём поставили крест, так как тот имел навыки обычного гражданина. Изначально он хотел вернуться в свой мир, но из-за ошибки представителей королевства не смог этого сделать и был вынужден остаться жить в другом мире. Сменив имя на Фурио, он решил жить в своё удовольствие. И вот так, прогуливаясь по новому для себя миру, он победил слизь, получил второй уровень и, взглянув после этого на характеристики, увидел, что все они имеют значение «∞». С этого и начинается его непринуждённая жизнь в другом мире.

---

(source: readmanga)
description.uk: Баназу, звичайного торговця, викликають до іншого світу і нарікають Героєм. Проте увагою він був оточений зовсім недовго - як тільки виявилось, що його здібності не відрізняються від здібностей пересічної людини, бідолаху виставили за двері без можливості повернутись додому. Так і почалось його спокійне життя у зовсім чужому світі, але як тільки він досягнув 2 рівня...
description.vi: Banaza là một thương nhân luôn chăm chỉ làm việc mỗi ngày đã bị đột nhiên triệu hồi tới Vương Quốc Ma Pháp Klyrode xa lạ làm ứng viên dũng sĩ. Tuy nhiên, anh đã bị đánh trượt vì chỉ có cấp độ 1 giống như dân thường. Không những vậy, anh còn không thể trở về vì sai lầm của chính quyền... Banza đã rời vương đô để tới vùng biên cảnh và phải chiến đấu với slime để giữ mạng. Thế rồi, câu chuyện có bước chuyển biến lớn sau khi anh thay đổi hình dáng và tên họ. Một ma thú đã phải lòng anh đi tới hôn nhân. Thế là họ cùng nhau hướng tới một cuộc sống thảnh thơi, không phân biệt chủng tộc!
description.pt-br:
Banaza foi invocado ao reino mágico de Cryroad como candidato a herói. No entanto, por ter especificações como as de uma pessoa comum, ele foi desqualificado e não pôde voltar ao seu mundo devido a um erro das pessoas que o invocaram. Sendo apenas nível 2, Banaza obterá forças além de sua compreensão.  


---

description.en: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

Class President's and Masochism Girl's Yuri

title.en: Makyou Seikatsu: Gakeppuchi Boukensha ga Hikikomoru ni wa Hirosugiru

altTitles.ja: 魔境生活 〜崖っぷち冒険者が引きこもるには広すぎる〜

description.en:
After being expelled from his family home, our main character tries his hand at becoming an adventurer, only to find out that things aren't quite as they seem. Determined to change his fate, and with the money he's saved up, he heads out to purchase a plot of land in the remote, unexplored wilderness, with the intent of forging his perfect new life. Little does he know, this expanse is infamous as the 'Demonic Realm,' a treacherous territory brimming with savage plants and creatures!

But navigating the daily trials of this life-threatening wilderness may prove be a challenge. In his journey of growth, an array of inhabitants, each driven by their motives, decide to follow him, bringing vibrancy back into his life. However, unseen powers resolute in preventing the Demonic Realm from being conquered begin to surface... Will he be able to endure, triumph, and make this land his new home?
description.ja:
実家を追い出されて冒険者になるも、堕落の一途を辿る主人公の青年。このままでは駄目だと一念発起した彼は、超辺境にある土地を購入して理想の住み処を作ろうとする。しかしその土地は『魔境』と呼ばれる、凶暴な動植物がうごめく超危険地帯であった！
日々命がけのサバイバルを生き抜き、徐々に逞しくなってゆく青年。そんな彼のもとに訳アリな住人たちも集まり生活が賑やかになるが、魔境を放っておかない勢力も現れて……！？

title.en: Zombie Sekai de Harem wo Tsukurou!

altTitles.ja: ゾンビ世界でハーレムをつくろう!

description.en: The world is on the brink of collapse due to the zombie threat. Meanwhile, I’m living the most thrilling and tantalizing days of my life! A high school boy who loves shogi and gaming discovers a mysterious power he possesses for the first time in this zombie-infested world.
description.ja: 世界は今、ゾンビの脅威で滅びかけている。俺は今、サイコーにエチエチな日々を過ごしている――。将棋とゲームが大好きなオタクな男子高校生が、ゾンビの世界になって初めて自分が持つ”ある力”を知った。

Even the Student Council has Holes

description.en: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.
description.ja: この生徒会の面子ときたら、あほの子だったり、恐ろしかったり、むっつりだったり、ちょっと変！ でも、それがなんだか、妙に可愛く思える今日この頃……。

altTitles.ja: 渚のサーメイド

altTitles.es-la: La Maid Tiburón de la Costa

description.en:
Wataru is a lonely boy who lost his parents in an accident. For some reason, there is one maid—her name is Kosame, and she has been by his side since he was little. Yes, she never changed... Set in a unique coastal fishing village with rows of houses called "boathouses," a love story of eternal love begins! (MTL)

---
**Links:**  
- Alternative Official Raw - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM05203826010000_68) and [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62407)
description.ja: 事故で両親を亡くした天涯孤独な少年のワタル。そんな彼と何故かともに暮らす親代わりのメイドさんがひとり。彼女の名前はこさめといい、ワタルが小さなころからずっと変わらずそばにいる。そう、姿も変わらずずっと……。
description.es-la:
Wataru es un chico solitario que perdió a sus padres en un accidente. Por alguna razón tiene una maid que comienza a vivir con él en lugar de sus padres. Su nombre es Kosame y siempre ha estado al lado de Wataru desde que este era pequeño. Y sí, siempre ha tenido el mismo aspecto… 
Ambientada en un pueblo pesquero con hileras de casas llamadas Funaya, ¡Aquí es donde comienza esta historia de amor y persecución por el “Amor Eterno”!

altTitles.ja: ぼくの好きな人が好きな人

altTitles.zh-hk: 我喜歡的人所喜歡的人

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Suki na Hito ga Suki na Hito

description.en: This story begins when the protagonist, a boy named Sora Akizuki, confesses his love to Miya Fuwa, a girl he has been in love with for a long time, and is rejected. When Sora learns that Miya likes someone else, he visits the dubious “Trialing Club," of which he is president, and tries to find out if he is the right person for her. The first episode shows the reality of the Trialing Club, whose activities one cannot imagine from its name, and the reason why its president, Suzukaze, created the club.
description.ru: Эта история начинается с того, что главный герой, мальчик по имени Сора Акидзуки, признается в любви Мие Фува, девушке, в которую он давно влюблен, и получает отказ. Когда Сора узнает, что Мия любит другого, он посещает сомнительный “Эксперементальный клуб”, президентом которого является этот незнакомец, и пытается выяснить, подходит ли он ей. В первом эпизоде показана реальность Эксперементального клуба, деятельность которого невозможно представить, исходя из его названия, и причина, по которой его президент Судзукадзе создал этот клуб.
description.vi:
Câu chuyện này bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, một chàng trai tên Sora Akizuki, thú nhận tình yêu của mình với Miya Fuwa, một cô gái mà anh đã yêu từ lâu nhưng bị từ chối. Khi Sora biết rằng Miya thích một người khác, anh ấy đã đến thăm “Câu lạc bộ thử việc” đáng ngờ mà anh ấy là chủ tịch, và cố gắng tìm hiểu xem anh ấy có phải là người phù hợp với cô ấy không.
Tập đầu tiên cho thấy thực tế của Câu lạc bộ Thử nghiệm, những hoạt động mà người ta không thể tưởng tượng được từ cái tên của nó, và lý do tại sao chủ tịch của nó, Suzukaze, lại thành lập câu lạc bộ.
description.es-la: Está historia empieza cuando el protagonista, un chico llamado Sora Akizuki, confiesa su amor a Miya Fuwa, una chica de la que está enamorado desde hace tiempo, y es rechazado. Cuando Sora se entera de que a Miya le gusta otra persona, visita el dudoso "Club de Ensayos", del que es presidente, e intenta averiguar si es la persona adecuada para ella. El primer episodio muestra la realidad del Club de Ensayos, cuyas actividades no se puede imaginar por su nombre, y la razón por la que su presidente, Suzukaze, creó el club.
description.pt-br: A história começa quando o protagonista, um garoto chamado Sora Akizuki, confessa seu amor a Miya Fuwa, uma garota por quem está apaixonado há muito tempo, entretanto, ele é rejeitado. Quando Sora descobre que Miya gosta de outra pessoa e que essa pessoa faz parte de um clube duvidoso, Sora sai em busca para tentar descobrir se é alguém confiável.

description.en: The sequel to Waltz wa Shiroi Dress de. You will see how the lives of Koto, Sajit and Masaomi go on. (Source: MU)

Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

altTitles.ms: Alya yang duduk di sebelah saya terkadang membisikkan kata manis dalam bahasa Rusia
اليا يڠ دودوق دسبله ساي ترکادڠ ممبيسيقکن کات مانيس دالم بهاس روسيا

altTitles.es: Alya a veces me susurra en ruso

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

altTitles.vi: Giết Chết Nam Chính, Ta Trở Thành Nữ Ma Đầu.

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

altTitles.ja: 今日もベランダで

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

altTitles.th: วันนี้ที่ระเบียง

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

title.en: Senki Survival Saga: Isekai no Unmei o Kaketa Mujintou Fujun Iseikouyuu

altTitles.ja: 戦姫サバイバルサガ〜異世界の運命をかけた無人島フジュン異性交遊〜
戦姫サバイバルサガ-異世界の運命をかけた無人島フジュン異性交遊-

altTitles.ja-ro: Senki Survival Saga ~Isekai no Unmei wo Kaketa Mujintou Fujun Iseikouyuu~

altTitles.en: Warrior Princess Survival Saga: The Unsanctioned Intergender Relations on a Deserted Island, Battling for the Fate of Another World

description.en:
Anastasia, an elf renowned as a once-in-a-millennium magical talent, faces the final battle of a three-way war in another world. In the midst of battle with her arch enemies, the demon race, Anastasia is enveloped in an intense light and, when she awakens, finds herself on an uninhabited island. As Anastasia strolls around the island, a mysterious human appears before her, but she can no longer use magic...!?

A survival comedy featuring the most powerful and beautiful girls from another world and an older man washed ashore on an uninhabited island!

(Source: Kadokawa)
description.ja:
千年に一人と言われる魔法の才能を持つエルフ・アナスタシアは、異世界で三つ巴の戦争の最終決戦へと赴く。
仇敵である魔族との戦いの最中激しい光に身を包まれたアナスタシアが目を覚ますとそこは、無人島であった。
無人島を散策するアナスタシアの前に謎の人間が現れ、しかも魔法が使えなくなっており…！？
異世界から来た最強美少女たちと無人島に流れ着いたオッサンによるサバイバルコメディ！

title.en: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai

altTitles.en: Reborn as a Space Mercenary: I Woke Up Piloting the Strongest Starship!

altTitles.ja: 目覚めたら最強装備と宇宙船持ちだったので、一戸建て目指して傭兵として自由に生きたい

altTitles.ja-ro: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai

altTitles.zh: 一觉醒来坐拥神装和飞船，我决定以买一套独门独户的房子为目标作为佣兵自由地活下去

altTitles.zh-hk: 覺醒起來就持有最強裝備和宇宙飛船，所以我決定以買一個私人住宅為目標作為傭兵自由地活下去

altTitles.ru: Я очнулся, будучи пилотом сильнейшего космического корабля, а потому решил стать межгалактическим наёмником

altTitles.en: When I Woke Up, I Got the Strongest Equipment and a Starship, so I Went and Became a Mercenary in Order to Live as I Please while Aiming for a Detached House

description.en:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he’s always dreamed of!


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/reborn-as-a-space-mercenary-i-woke-up-piloting-the-strongest-starship-light-novel/)
description.ru: Это история о парне, неожиданно оказавшемся в открытом космосе с личным боевым кораблем. На этом космолёте он будет путешествовать, попутно спасать девушек, оказавшихся в беде, флиртовать с ними, зарабатывать деньги и использовать свои знания из игры, чтобы вести свободный и непринужденный образ жизни.

altTitles.ja: わざと見せてる? 加茂井さん。

altTitles.en: Kamoi-san, Are You Showing It on Purpose?
Are You Showing It on Purpose?

description.en: Sudo, is an unassuming second-year junior high boy, who likes to draw. Kamoi-san, his classmate, is a middle school girl (JC) in a short skirt who stands out everywhere she goes! These are the days between a flamboyant gal and an ordinary boy.
description.fr:
On suit l'histoire de Sutô, un jeune étudiant en seconde année du lycée plutôt banal voire transparent, mais qui a un passion pour les mangas et sait dessiner. Kamoi, la gyarû de sa classe, elle-même fan de manga, remarque les qualités de dessinateur de Sutô. 
S'installe entre eux une relation d'amitié, voir...
description.ja: 中学２年生の加茂井さんは、クラスに一人はいたようでいなかった、でもやっぱりいたＪＣギャル！　そんなクラスでも目立つ加茂井さんと、存在感のない地味な僕の物語。

altTitles.ja: 腫れ物心中

description.en: Kei, a diligent cook, must come to terms with personal loss as well as his feelings of alienation. While the people close to him may try to help, he has to reach the important conclusions himself...

altTitles.ja: 憂国のモリアーティ

description.ar: تدور الأحداث في إنجلترا خلال العصر الفيكتوري، حيث ننتبّع البروفيسور “جيمس موريارتي” خصم المُحقق الشهير “شيرلوك هولمز “، وذلك خلال نقطة فاصلة من حياة الأول حينما تم تبنّيه هوَ وشقيقه الأصغر “وليام مورياتي” من قِبَل عائلة من النبلاء وذلك بفضل ذكاء وحنكة “جيمس”، إلاّ أنه وأخوه يقرّران التخلّص من الطبقة الحاكمة في إنجلترا وكسر كل القوانين مما يجعلهما ينزلقان إلى الحياة الإجراميّة، وكذلك يضعهما في مفترق طُرق مع “شيرلوك” خلال تحقيقاته، في هذا السلسلة سوف يُعاد رواية سلسلة كُتب شيرلوك هولمز الكلاسيكيّة من وجهة نظر “موريارتي” هذه المرة!
description.en: In the late 19th century, Great Britain rules over a quarter of the world. Nobles sit in their fancy homes in comfort and luxury, while the working class slaves away at their jobs. When young Albert James Moriarty’s upper-class family adopts two lower-class orphans, the cruelty the boys experience at his family’s hands cements Albert’s hatred of the nobility he was born into. He asks the older of the two boys—who has a genius mind and a killer instinct—to help him rid the world of evil, starting with Albert’s own family!
description.ru:
Конец позапрошлого века, Британская империя правит миром, и в основе всего лежит классовая система. И тут внезапно появляется Джеймс Мориарти - молодой человек, желающий уничтожить зло, проистекающее из классовой дискриминации, и создать идеальную страну.  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Kana](https://www.kana.fr/produit/moriarty)
description.pt-br: A história de Sherlock Holmes, reimaginada com Moriarty como protagonista e explorando sua motivação para se tornar o maior criminoso que a Grã-Bretanha já viu.

altTitles.ja: 無法島

description.en: A prequel to Jisatsutou. The Japanese government exiles convicts facing execution to a remote lawless island to fend for themselves.

altTitles.ja: えんどうくんの実験ノート

description.en: Tsuda and Endou have come to realize they can't stay the way they are forever. If asked about their relationship, they don't know how to answer. What do they need to stay together? It's not enough. They want more. They can't stop their feelings…

Pania Elarona, an average elf with the special ability to see people's status windows, idolizes the infamous lone wolf Naos Shalia. When a new law forbids solo dungeon adventuring, she volunteers to pair up with him. Reluctantly, Naos agrees, but a hidden lust demon curse triggers in the dungeon, trapping him in a passionate haze! Pania checks his status window, and a mission appears saying... he needs to get off?! Can these elves conquer the curse, or will the lust be too strong to overcome?

In a city where time is currency, Ayla fights to uncover the truth behind a mysterious thief stealing Life Spans. As the stakes rise, love, survival, and sacrifice intertwine in a story where every second counts.

altTitles.ja: 不滅のあなたへ

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

**Links:**  
**Officially Translated:**

description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

title.en: Nichiasa Suki no Otaku ga Akuyaku Seito ni Tenseishita Kekka, Hametsu Flag ga Houkaishiteiku Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.ja: ニチアサ好きのオタクが悪役生徒に転生した結果、破滅フラグが崩壊していく件について

altTitles.en: Regarding the Destruction of the Destruction Flag as a Result of a Nichiasa-Loving Otaku Being Reincarnated as a Villainous Student.

description.en:
Yugo Kurei is a high school student that loves tokusatsu hero shows. One day, he loses his life protecting a child from a street slasher, but he is reincarnated in another world as Yugo Clay, a character from a certain game. However, Yugo is the most disliked person in the school and is destined to die tragically... He was reincarnated as a villain, but with the new power of magic in his hands, he aims to become a hero!

"In this world, I can become the strongest hero!" A hero story of a tokusatsu otaku who rises from the bottom while crushing his doom flags!
description.ja:
日曜日の朝に放送されているヒーロー番組をこよなく愛している高校生・呉井雄悟。ある日、通り魔から子供を庇って命を落とすが、気づくと【ルミナス・ヒストリー】というゲームのキャラクター、ユーゴ・クレイとして異世界転生していた。しかし、ユーゴというキャラは学園一の嫌われ者で、ゆくゆくは無様に命を落とす運命・・・

そんな悪役キャラに転生したが、魔法という新たな力を手にしたことで、ヒーローになれる可能性に気づく！

「この世界なら俺は“本物”のヒーローになれる！」

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!
description.ja: 高飛車三白眼ポンコツセレブお嬢様・金田持子さんが圧倒的な財力で庶民をマウンティングしまくります!! 異次元セレブ行動で周囲は大パニックに陥ってしまうのですわ～!! ネット上に金田さんファン大量発生中!!

description.ar: تسو تيانشين هو آخر إنسان حي في مدينة مليئة بالزومبي. فقط عندما كان متأكداً من أنه مات ، يجد روحه تعود إلى ما قبل ذلك اليوم المشؤوم قبل عشر سنوات. يقسم أنه سوف يحمي الناس المهمين له هذه المرة ويجتمع مع عشيقته. تابعوا نضاله من أجل البقاء بمساعدة ذكرياته للسنوات العشر القادمة!
description.en: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
description.fr: uo Tianchen est l'un des derniers survivants sur terre depuis qu'une épidémie venant de l'espace s'était abattue sur terre, il l'y a de cela 10 ans. Alors qu'il est sur le point de mourir, Zuo fît donc ses adieux à sa petite amie qu'il avait rencontré durant l'épidémie. C'est alors que, d'un coup, alors qu'il était sur le point de mourir, il retourna dans le temps 10 ans auparavant, quelques heures avant le début de l'épidémie. C'est alors qu'il décida de sauver son meilleur ami qui avait périt dès le début de l'épidémie, 10 ans auparavant, et c'est alors qu'il se met à la recherche de sa copine qu'il avait dans l'ancienne apocalypse.
description.ru:
Зе Тянчен – последний выживший человек в городе, зараженном зомби-инфекцией. Будучи на грани смерти, он внезапно оказался в своем теле десять лет назад, когда город еще не был заражен. Он решил, что в этот раз спасет близких ему людей и воссоединится со своей старой любовью.   
  
Следите за его приключениями, в которых он использует свои воспоминания о следующих 10 годах, чтобы выжить и спасти своих близких!

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: 電騎装鋼 ライジン

description.en:
A young man called Kanou Ryoto was once saved as a child by a mysterious hero named "Raijin".

Ten years later, Ryoto works in his sister's dog cafe. While walking the dogs one day, he happens to save a strange dog from drowning. Soon after a monster attacks his sister and suddenly the dog he had saved earlier starts to talk to him. Not only that, he also teaches him how to transform into a battle hero and protect his loved ones.

This is the fateful moment Ryoto changes into Raijin Model One!

title.en: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun (Mafia Alternate Universe)

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん if Episode of 魔フィア

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia

altTitles.vi: Iruma Giá Đáo!: IF Episode of MAFIA

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun: IruMafia Edition

altTitles.ko: 악마에 입문했습니다! if Episode of 魔fia

description.en: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?
description.ja: 暴力や犯罪は当たり前の貧民街-スラム-で育った心優しい少年・イルマ。瀕死状態で倒れていた、マフィア組織【バビル】のドン・サリバンを助けたことで、イルマの運命の歯車が動き出す！ マフィア組織【バビル】を中心に巻き起こる、マフィア・アクションコメディ！
description.vi: Spin-Off của tác phẩm"Mairimashita! Iruma-kun" theo hướng What-If, thế giới của tác phẩm lần này sẽ xoay quanh việc các nhân vật sẽ sống trong thế giới của các Mafia
description.es-la: ¡Un spin-off oficial de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun, en un universo alternativo en el que Iruma se convierte en un destacado miembro de la mafia. A pesar de tener sólo cinco años, Iruma ha visto muchas cosas como niño de la calle... ¡la más reciente, a un anciano desangrándose justo delante de donde vive! Como buen chico, Iruma se dedica a curar al anciano y no le da importancia. Sin embargo, cuando el anciano regresa de repente, se revela como Don Sullivan, ¡jefe de la organización clandestina conocida como Babyls! Se ofrece a adoptar a Iruma como su nieto, una oferta que Iruma se ve incapaz de rechazar...
description.pt-br: Os amados personagens de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun estrela neste spinoff baseado na máfia! O jovem Iruma salva um chefe da máfia ferido da morte... e então se torna seu neto!?

title.en: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison

altTitles.ja: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

altTitles.ja-ro: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

description.en: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

altTitles.ja: ココロのプログラム

description.en: An elementary schooler, Usami Kyuu encounters Ichiko, a female robot trying to learn about [heart]. What awaits the two that start to live together... Boy X Robot Girl, Begin!
description.fr:
Kyû USAMI vit seul avec sa mère. Un jour d'été, il voit débarquer chez lui un robot qui ressemble à s'y méprendre à une jeune fille. Cette créature est venue étudier l'âme humaine, et le jeune Kyû va rapidement se rendre compte qu'on peut facilement tomber amoureux d'un être pourtant dépourvu de cœur…

Maison d'édition FR : Delcourt/Tonkam
description.ja: プール帰りの小学生・宇佐美九が出会ったのは、「心」を学びに来たロボットの少女・いちこ。一緒に暮らすことになった二人を待つのは...。ボーイミーツロボットガール、開演！
description.th: ผู้ที่ อุซามิ คิว เด็กประถมผู้กลับมาจากสระว่ายน้ำได้พบคือ อิจิโกะ สาวน้อยหุ่นยนต์ที่มาเรียนรู้ "หัวใจ" สิ่งที่รอทั้งสองซึ่งจับผลัดจับผลูได้มาใช้ชีวิตด้วยกันคือ... บอยมีตโรบอตเกิร์ล เปิดม่าน!
description.pt-br:
Ichiko, uma garota robô, conhece Kyuu, um humano, e as engrenagens que nunca haviam se movido começam a funcionar.

Durante as férias de verão, uma robô com aparência humana passa a viver com Kyuu Usami, um garoto que, até então, morava apenas com sua mãe. Kyuu é atraído pela garota, que está tentando entender o "coração". Ela, por sua vez, nutre pelo rapaz um amor infantil. Pouco a pouco, o sentimento cresce e os envolve... Boy meets robot girl, que comece o espetáculo! [Planet Mangá]

description.en:
In a world where monster hunters are hailed as heroes, Cheon Haesun has been treated like an outcast because of his abnormal looks. As if that wasn't bad enough, a pack of monsters attacks his neighborhood on the day he discovers he's dying from an unknown illness!

With his sister's sacrifice, Haesun survives and somehow awakens to become a Poisoner, a rare hunter with toxic healing abilities.

But will his poisonous powers cure Haesun's illness and guarantee a normal life he's always dreamed of?

altTitles.ja: ときめけ魔法幼女ココピュア

description.en: Spin-off of Onee-san wa Joshi Shougakusei ni Kyoumi ga arimasu. Same degeneracy, but with magical girls.

title.en: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata

altTitles.en: How My Cute Girlfriend and I Started a Love Story

altTitles.ja: 私と彼女のかわいい恋のはじめ方
てんで性悪キューピッド

description.en: The Koinobori yakuza family's souls are expensive commodoties, a source of great pride to those of the demon world's soul bank. But when the Koinobori heir, Ryuji, is born with a pure soul engrossed with fairies and angels, it's up to Maria to become his personal cupid and reform him so that he continues the Koinobori's lascivious family line!

altTitles.ja: 今朝も揺られてます

altTitles.en: They are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

title.en: Tourigakari ni Wanpointo Adobaisu Shite Iku Taipu no Yankii

altTitles.ja: 通りがかりにワンポイントアドバイスしていくタイプのヤンキー

altTitles.th: พี่โจ๋ ONE POINT ปรึกษาฟรีไม่คิดตังค์

altTitles.ko: 지나가는 길에 원포인트 어드바이스를 하는 양아치

altTitles.ja-ro: Toorigakari ni One Point Advice shite Iku Type no Yankee

description.en: Sakurai-san looks like a yankee, but gives people he passes one point advice. Those who meet him for the first time are often scared by his frightening appearance but through the advice, they learn of how kind hearted he can be. Slowly, Sakurai's circle of people begin to grow. He's kind, considerate, knowledgeable and versatile in all forms of sports…!! Today, the super high-spec Sakurai who has a ridiculous gap in his looks and personality continues to give one point advice to various people, making their day a little better.
description.es: Sakurai parece un delincuente, pero inmediatamente aconseja a la gente que encuentra. Aquellos que lo conocen por primera vez se asustan frecuentemente con su apariencia amenazante, pero a través de sus consejos, se dan cuenta de que tan querido y bueno puede ser. Lentamente, el círculo de allegados de Sakurai empieza a crecer. El es bueno, considerado, con experiencia y versatilidad en todos lo deportes! Hoy, el super-adepto Sakurai, quien tiene una brecha enorme entre su apariencia y su personalidad, continúa dandole consejos inmediatos a varias personas, mejorándoles su día un poquito.
description.pt-br: Sakurai-san parece um yankee, mas dá às pessoas que passa um conselho pontual. Aqueles que o encontram pela primeira vez muitas vezes ficam assustados com sua aparência assustadora, mas através dos conselhos, eles aprendem como ele pode ser bondoso. Lentamente, o círculo de pessoas de Sakurai começou a crescer. Ele é gentil, atencioso, experiente e versátil em todas as formas de esportes … !! Hoje, o superespecial Sakurai, que tem uma lacuna ridícula em sua aparência e personalidade, continua a dar conselhos de um ponto para várias pessoas, tornando seu dia um pouco melhor.

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn't make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl. Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her "The class's second cutest girl" behind her back. On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, "the cutest girl in class's" invitation just to hang out in my house with me. Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59139)
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.ja:
「じゃあ、内緒の友達ってことで――」

クラスでぼっちな俺・前原真樹に、初めてできた友だち・朝凪海。いつも輪の中心にいて、他の男子からは『クラスで２番目に可愛い』なんて陰で噂されている。ぼっちの俺なんかと住む世界が違う――と思いきや、まさかのＢ級映画好き!? ひょんなことから友だちになった朝凪さんは、金曜日の放課後だけこっそり俺の家に遊びに来る。映画にゲーム、漫画の趣味も合う彼女との楽しいひととき。
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

altTitles.ja: 異世界建国記

altTitles.it: Cronache dalla Fondazione di un Impero in un Altro Mondo

altTitles.pt-br: Crônicas da Fundação de um Império em Outro Mundo

description.en:
A protagonist reborn in another world.  Apparently he had been reincarnated as an abandoned child.  Before his eyes were abandoned children like him.  In order to survive, he led them into farming.  Little by little, orphans gathered, and upon hearing rumors of a village, others began to migrate.

The group that had been nothing but children had become a village before anyone realized. Then various countries in the surroundings started to have an eye on it. This is the epic tale of the man who would later be known as the Divine Emperor.
description.fr:
Un protagoniste renaît dans un autre monde, se réincarnant en tant qu'enfant abandonné. Autour de lui, d'autres enfants abandonnés sont dans la même situation. Pour survivre, il les guide dans l'agriculture. Peu à peu, des orphelins se rassemblent et, attirés par les rumeurs d'un village, d'autres commencent à arriver.

Le groupe d'enfants finit par former un véritable village sans que personne ne s'en aperçoive. Bientôt, plusieurs pays voisins commencent à sy 'intéresser. Voici l'épopée de l'homme qui sera plus tard connu sous le nom de l'Empereur Divin.
description.it:
Il protagonista rinasce in un altro mondo.
A quanto pare, sembra che si sia reincarnato in un bambino orfano.
Poco dopo, si trova davanti altri bambini abbandonati come lui.
Per poter sopravvivere, si mette alla loro guida ed iniziano a coltivare.
Poco per volta, iniziano così a creare un villaggio. Arrivano altri orfani. Ma anche come la voce di questa comunità si diffonde, persone di tutti i tipi.
Questo gruppo, partito come nient'altro che un gruppo di bambini, diventa quindi un villaggio prima di rendersene conto.
Ed è così, che i diversi Paesi circostanti iniziano ad interessarsi a loro.
Questa è l'epica storia dell'uomo che in seguito sarebbe stato conosciuto come il Divo Imperatore.
description.pt-br:
Um protagonista renascido em outro mundo.  Aparentemente ele reencarnou como uma criança abandonada.  Diante de seus olhos estavam crianças abandonadas como ele.  Para sobreviver, ele os conduziu à agricultura.  Aos poucos, os órfãos foram se reunindo e, ao ouvirem rumores de uma aldeia, outros começaram a migrar.

 O grupo que não passava de crianças tornou-se uma aldeia antes que alguém percebesse.  Então vários países do entorno começaram a ficar de olho nisso.  Esta é a história épica do homem que mais tarde seria conhecido como o Divino Imperador

description.en: This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり農家

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Nông Dân Ở Thế Giới Khác

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.
